xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/645876-A Barry Manilow Christmas: Live by Request 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qQJu9rRhAE2isyx0EoUBDHDbqEd.jpg The internationally renowned superstar Barry Manilow takes requests for Christmas songs and performs live with a band, an orchestra, and special guests including Cyndi Lauper. And in a rare holiday treat, old friends Barry and Bette Midler join together, via media magic, in a duet that each taped separately. Mr. Manilow also hosts this 2-hour festive songfest. A Barry Manilow Christmas: Live by Request
